meanings.definition: The quality or state of being round or plump.
meanings.sent1: The rotundities of the pumpkin made it perfect for carving.
meanings.sent2: She admired the rotundities of the chubby baby's cheeks.
meanings.sent3: The rotundities of the snowman's belly made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The rotundities of the full moon lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The rotundities of the water droplets on the leaf sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A round or plump figure or form.
meanings.sent1: The artist sculpted the rotundities of the Buddha with great care.
meanings.sent2: The rotundities of the vase made it a unique piece of art.
meanings.sent3: The rotundities of the teddy bear made it huggable and cute.
meanings.sent4: The rotundities of the clouds in the sky resembled fluffy cotton candy.
meanings.sent5: The rotundities of the ripe apple made it irresistible to pick and eat.
